description: The HR Division at OSFI requires the services of a Contractor to provide a 360 Assessment and coaching service to support and develop OSFI’s people leaders.
duration_in_months: This procurement is non-recurring: Anticipated contract duration is 18months

### Opportunity Description:

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) is seeking a Contractor to provide 360 Assessment and coaching services to support and develop the people leaders within the organization.

### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria:

* 360 Assessment and coaching services
* Successful bid will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price

### How to Respond:

The RFP package, including the solicitation documents and bid form, can be found on the CanadaBuys website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22122/npp_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22122/npp_0.pdf).

### Note:

The bid submission deadline is November 14, 2023, and no late submissions will be accepted.  It is the responsibility of the respondent to ensure that their bid is submitted in a timely manner.

**Revised Information**
